title: Growing Marijuana
description:
Growing Marijuana Mega Torrent

This is a torrent dedicated to the pursuit of happiness.  This torrent has a ton of information on growing weed.  It has videos and eBooks on the topic of growing marijuana and staying safe in the process.  The videos are all .avi (using XviD I think) and range from about 30 minutes to 1 hour and 45 minutes.  Meanwhile, some of the eBooks contain only one page of information, while others contain upwards of 400+ pages with full color.  The eBooks are all in .pdf format.. These eBooks and Videos cover vast subjects including; the drug war, how to grow, and how to stay safe during your grow.  These have been downloaded from other torrents on various websites and as such, I take no credit for any of the content, I have merely combined what I believe is worthwhile information.   I wanted to include as much information as possible

Note: This torrent hovers around 4.7 gigs.  This is intentional, burn this stuff to a disk and hand it out to your friends, lets out-grow the government.  Just remember, this kind of knowledge might become illegal in the future.
This Torrent was Orginally released at The Pirate Bay as a password free torrent.  If this torrent has been compressed (.rar) and stuck with a password, do not download.

Videos (3.58 GB):
High Times Ultimate Grow DVD by Jorge Cervantes Volumes 1, 2 and 3.
Penn and Teller's Bullshit! S02E04 - War on Drugs
The Union - The Business Behind Getting High
Marijuana - Guide To Growing Cannabis - Jazzy J Productions
Never Get Busted Vol 2. Never Get Raided - Berry Cooper
(Note: these all are confirmed to play with VLC media player  [ http://www.videolan.org/vlc/ ] It's open source.)
